entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 30 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
